original_title: New Year's Concert 2021 - Vienna Philharmonic (Riccardo Muti)
overview: The 2021 Vienna Philharmonic New Year's Concert took place on 1 January 2021 in the Golden Hall of the Musikverein in Vienna, under the baton of Riccardo Muti, whose close musical partnership with the Vienna Philharmonic has now extended nearly 50 years. The concert was broadcast in over 90 countries, but took place without a live audience due to the global pandemic.
title: New Year's Concert 2021 - Vienna Philharmonic (Riccardo Muti)
